entry.title: Daily update - Jan 1, 2025
entry.content: Our Game of the Month December Contest is underway: Share your best Lichess standard game played in December 2024 until 5 January! The winner will be announced on 14 January, followed by a blog post with commentary on the game.

entry.title: Daily update - Jan 1, 2025
entry.content: The FIDE World Blitz Championship 2024 ended with GMs Magnus Carlsen and Ian Nepomniachtchi as co-champions in an unprecedented decision by FIDE President Arkady Dvorkovich, after Carlsen suggested to Nepomniachtchi that they share 1st place. GM Ju Wenjun is the new Women's World Blitz Champion for the first time in her career, defeating GM Lei Tingjie in the tiebreaks!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 31, 2024
entry.content: The final stage of the FIDE World Blitz Championship 2024 starts at 19:00 UTC! GM Magnus Carlsen, who has returned to play after withdrawing from the Rapid event, meets GM Hans Niemann in the Quarter-Final and GM Ju Wenjun faces two-time and reigning Women's World Blitz Champion GM Valentina Gunina in the Women's tournament, among others.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 29, 2024
entry.content: Congrats FM @Ragehunter on winning our 2024 Winter Marathon - their third Marathon victory in a row - with a 61% win rate in 501 games, 57 points ahead of runner-up GM Mahdi Gholami Orimi! Thanks to all 25,275 registered users who played a total of 303,231 games and 21,886,759 moves! The next Marathon will take place on 26th April.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 29, 2024
entry.content: 18-year-old GM Volodar Murzin is the 2024 FIDE World Rapid Champion! GM Alexander Grischuk came 2nd and GM Ian Nepomniachtchi 3rd. GM Koneru Humpy has won the FIDE Women's World Rapid Championship, for the second time after 2019, ahead of GMs Ju Wenjun and Kateryna Lagno!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 28, 2024
entry.content: GM Magnus Carlsen quit the FIDE World Rapid&Blitz Championships after being unpaired from Round 9 for violating the dress code by wearing jeans and refusing to change them. He didn't appeal the decision, calling the incident "a matter of principle". FIDE issued a statement explaining that these "rules have been in place for years" and apply "equally to all players".

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 26, 2024
entry.content: Our 2024 Winter Marathon starts on 28 December at midnight UTC! Join us for 24 hours of 3+0 Blitz and be part of one of the biggest chess tournaments in history. The top 500, top 100, top 50, top 10 and the winner will all get a unique trophy.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 25, 2024
entry.content: Our first Titled Arenas for next year have been announced - as usual, they will be preceded by a Warm-up Arena open to all players.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 23, 2024
entry.content: A new progress bar in the open tournaments section of our homepage shows you the remaining time of started arenas, making it easier to see how much time is left before you join a tournament.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 22, 2024
entry.content: Lichess is translated to 80+ different languages. Thank you to Tux960 for translating over 11,000 words this month for our Tamil translation! You can help contribute other languages with Crowdin.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 21, 2024
entry.content: Congratulations to GM Andrew Tang for winning our Titled Arena December! GM Nihal Sarin took 2nd place, ahead of GM Daniel Naroditsky in 3rd place.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 21, 2024
entry.content: Our December 1+0 Warm-up Arena starts in just 2 hours at 16:00 UTC! You will have the chance to play against some of the titled players before they enter the Titled Arena!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 20, 2024
entry.content: Our puzzle database comes from real user games played on Lichess - see if any of your masterpieces (or blunders) made it into the collection!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 17, 2024
entry.content: Your 2024 Lichess recap is ready! See a personalised look back at your chess activity this year.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 16, 2024
entry.content: Congratulations to Полина Янученко1 for winning our Streamers Battle December 2024! Congrats also to Ronaldo Playing Chess for taking 2nd place, to Zhigalko_Sergei & Friends for 3rd place, and to IM Manitodeplomo Fan Club for 4th place. Thanks to all participating streamers and 1,792 registered players!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 15, 2024
entry.content: Our December week of variant Shield Arenas starts at 16:00 UTC with the 3+2 Chess960 Arena! The winner will get a unique trophy and keep it until next month's arena.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 14, 2024
entry.content: Congrats @joddle on winning the Lichess Game of the Month November 2024! Thank you for all your countless submissions!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 12, 2024
entry.content: The Lichess Bundesliga, world's biggest online chess league, celebrates its 500th edition today after over 4 years - starting at 19:00 UTC!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 12, 2024
entry.content: 18-year-old GM Gukesh D has become the youngest World Chess Champion in history! Read our final recap blog and find out what happened in Game 14 against GM Ding Liren.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 12, 2024
entry.content: Watch the final classical game of the 2024 World Championship now on Twitch and YouTube with us and our commentators GM Ivan Cheparinov, IM Laura Unuk & GM Felix Blohberger!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 12, 2024
entry.content: GM Gukesh D missed some chances in Game 13 of the World Championship against GM Ding Liren and the game ended in a draw! We have summarised the game in our blog, again with annotations by GM Yannick Gozzoli.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 11, 2024
entry.content: Join us and today's livestream commentators IM Divya Deshmukh, IM Laura Unuk and GM Felix Blohberger now on Twitch and YouTube for Game 13 of the World Championship!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 11, 2024
entry.content: Streamers and communities, get ready for the next and final Streamers Battle of 2024 on December 16th at 16:00 UTC - again with prizes for streamers whose teams finish in the top 4!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 10, 2024
entry.content: GM Ding Liren bounced back and defeated GM Gukesh D to tie the score at 6-6, just before the final rest day of the World Championship 2024 and only two more games to play! Read our blog for a recap of Game 12, with annotations by GM Yannick Gozzoli.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 9, 2024
entry.content: Yesterday GM Gukesh D managed to take the lead over GM Ding Liren for the first time in the 2024 World Championship match: Can GM Ding Liren make a comeback today? Watch Game 12 now with us and our hosts IM Laura Unuk & GM Felix Blohberger on YouTube and Twitch!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 8, 2024
entry.content: Watch Game 11 of the World Championship now live on Twitch and YouTube with us and our hosts IM Laura Unuk and GM Felix Blohberger!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 7, 2024
entry.content: Congratulations to GM @caching for winning our Chess960 Titled Arena December 2024! GM Vahap Şanal took 2nd place and GM Mitrabha Guha finished 3rd.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 7, 2024
entry.content: Our Chess960 3+2 Warm-up Arena starts at 17:00 UTC! You will have the chance to play against some of the titled players before they enter the Chess960 Titled Arena!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 7, 2024
entry.content: Join us now on Twitch and YouTube for Game 10 of the World Championship, with live commentary from our stream hosts IM Laura Unuk and GM Felix Blohberger!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 6, 2024
entry.content: Our November 2024 free and open databases are available for download! You can now also find the games, puzzles, and engine evaluations on Hugging Face - with billions of chess data points to download, query, and stream. We're excited to see what you will build!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 5, 2024
entry.content: We have added many improvements and new features to Lichess over the past month! See what the developers and community contributors have been working on in our updated changelog.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 5, 2024
entry.content: Watch Game 9 of the World Championship now on Twitch and YouTube with us and our commentators GM Thomas Beerdsen and GM Felix Blohberger!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 4, 2024
entry.content: Both players had their chances in Game 8 of the World Championship, but in the end GMs Ding Liren and Gukesh D drew again. Read what happened in our recap blog, with annotations by GM Maxime Lagarde.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 4, 2024
entry.content: Join us now on Twitch and YouTube for Game 8 of the World Championship, with live commentary from GMs Felix Blohberger and Thomas Beerdsen! Replay yesterday's exciting game with annotations by GM Maxime Lagarde.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 3, 2024
entry.content: The second rest day of the World Championship 2024 is over and we are back now with live commentary on Twitch and YouTube - today with our host GM Felix Blohberger and returning guest GM Nils Grandelius!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 2, 2024
entry.content: Our December 1+0 Bullet Shield Arena, the first of seven daily Shield Arenas this week, is about to start! The winner will get a unique trophy and keep it until next month's tournament.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 2, 2024
entry.content: Our Game of the Month November Contest is underway: Share your best Lichess standard game played in November 2024 until 5 December! The winner will be announced on 14 December, followed by a blog post with commentary on the game.

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 1, 2024
entry.content: 21 Lichess team members from around the world travelled to Berlin for our meetup from 7-11 November: We summarised the days of chess, work and meeting the community in our blog. Thanks to TSG Oberschöneweide for hosting our public meetup and to Paul Meyer-Dunker from the Berlin Chess Federation for helping!

entry.title: Daily update - Dec 1, 2024
entry.content: Join us now on YouTube and Twitch for Game 6 of the World Championship, with live commentary from GM Nils Grandelius and our host IM Laura Unuk!

entry.title: Daily update - Nov 30, 2024
entry.content: GMs Gukesh D and Ding Liren also drew Game 5 of the World Championship. Find out how the defending World Champion Ding Liren could have kept the game going in our recap blog, again with annotations by GM Maxime Lagarde.

entry.title: Daily update - Nov 30, 2024
entry.content: Tune in now on YouTube and Twitch for live commentary of Game 5 of the World Championship - with GM Levon Aronian, GM Matthew Sadler and our host IM Laura Unuk!

entry.title: Daily update - Nov 29, 2024
entry.content: Game 4 of the World Championship ended with the second draw between GMs Ding Liren and Gukesh D. Read our summary in the recap blog, this time with annotations from former French champion GM Maxime Lagarde. For the next round, GMs Levon Aronian and Matthew Sadler will return to our live stream and commentate together with our host IM Laura Unuk!

entry.title: Daily update - Nov 29, 2024
entry.content: The World Championship match between GMs Ding Liren and Gukesh D continues with Game 4 after yesterday's break: Join us and our hosts IM Laura Unuk and GM Felix Blohberger now on Twitch and YouTube!

entry.title: Daily update - Nov 28, 2024
entry.content: Have you tried Lichess Voice Recognition? We just added new features like the pieces command, which reads the board to you, and more. Enable it in the settings or try it directly in Coordinates training by clicking on the voice recognition icon.

entry.title: Daily update - Nov 27, 2024
entry.content: Ahead of the first rest day, GM Gukesh D bounces back with a win over GM Ding Liren in Game 3 of the World Championship! We summarised what happened in our recap blog, again with annotations by GM David Navara.

entry.title: Daily update - Nov 27, 2024
entry.content: GM Levon Aronian and our hosts IM Laura Unuk and GM Felix Blohberger are live for Game 3 of the World Championship! Join us on Twitch and YouTube for commentary from the 2-time World Cup winner, 3-time Olympic Gold Medallist and former Rapid, Blitz & Chess960 World Champion.

entry.title: Daily update - Nov 26, 2024
entry.content: Game 2 of the World Championship ended in a draw, read what happened in our recap blog with annotations from GM David Navara. Tomorrow, our stream hosts IM Laura Unuk and GM Felix Blohberger will be joined by super GM and 4th highest rated player of all time, Levon Aronian, on YouTube and Twitch from 09:00 UTC!

entry.title: Daily update - Nov 26, 2024
entry.content: Watch Game 2 of the World Championship now on Twitch and YouTube with us and today's commentators IM Laura Unuk, GM Felix Blohberger and GM Matthew Sadler!

entry.title: Daily update - Nov 25, 2024
entry.content: GM Ding Liren defeated GM Gukesh D in Game 1 of the World Championship! Read our recap blog and replay the game with annotations by GM David Navara.

entry.title: Daily update - Nov 25, 2024
entry.content: Join us now on Twitch and YouTube for Game 1 of the World Championship with today's hosts IM Laura Unuk and the recently crowned European Champion GM Aleksandar Indjic!
